trans-unit.source: Defines the contract that ASP.NET implements to synchronously process HTTP Web requests using custom HTTP handlers.
trans-unit.target: Define o contrato que implementa o ASP.NET em sincronia processar pedidos de HTTP Web utilizando processadores HTTP personalizados.

trans-unit.source: You can write custom HTTP handlers to process specific, predefined types of HTTP requests in any Common Language Specification (CLS) compliant language.
trans-unit.target: Pode escrever processadores HTTP personalizados para processar tipos específicos, predefinidos de pedidos HTTP em qualquer idioma compatível com a especificação de idioma comum (CLS).

trans-unit.source: Executable code defined in the `HttpHandler` classes, rather than conventional ASP or ASP.NET Web pages, responds to these specific requests.
trans-unit.target: Código executável definido no `HttpHandler` classes, em vez de páginas Web de ASP.NET ou ASP convencionais, responder a estes pedidos específicos.

trans-unit.source: HTTP handlers give you a means of interacting with the low-level request and response services of the IIS Web server and provide functionality much like ISAPI extensions but with a simpler programming model.
trans-unit.target: Processadores HTTP dão-lhe um meio de interagir com os serviços de resposta do servidor Web do IIS e o pedido de baixo nível e fornecem funcionalidades muito como extensões ISAPI, mas com um modelo de programação mais simples.

trans-unit.source: If your handler will access session state values, it must implement the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.IRequiresSessionState> interface (a marker interface with no methods).
trans-unit.target: Se o processador irão aceder aos valores de estado de sessão, deve implementar o <xref:System.Web.SessionState.IRequiresSessionState>interface (uma interface de marcador com nenhuma métodos).</xref:System.Web.SessionState.IRequiresSessionState>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether another request can use the <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o outro pedido pode utilizar o <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: You explicitly set the IsReusable property to `true` or `false` by code you provide that overrides the IsReusable property accessor (getter).
trans-unit.target: Definir explicitamente a propriedade IsReusable como `true` ou `false` por código fornecer que substitui o acessor de propriedade IsReusable (getter).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"></xref> instance is reusable; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"> </xref> instância é reutilizáveis; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Enables processing of HTTP Web requests by a custom <xref uid="langword_csharp_HttpHandler" name="HttpHandler" href=""></xref> that implements the <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Permite o processamento de pedidos de HTTP Web por personalizadas <xref uid="langword_csharp_HttpHandler" name="HttpHandler" href=""> </xref> que implementa o <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"> </xref> interface.

trans-unit.source: Place your custom `HttpHandler` code in the ProcessRequest virtual method, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: Coloque a personalizada `HttpHandler` código no método virtual ProcessRequest, conforme mostrado no exemplo seguinte.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object that provides references to the intrinsic server objects (for example, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Request" name="Request" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Response" name="Response" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Session" name="Session" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_Server" name="Server" href=""></xref>) used to service HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> objeto fornece referências aos objetos intrínsecos do servidor (por exemplo, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Request" name="Request" href=""> </xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Response" name="Response" href=""> </xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Session" name="Session" href=""> </xref>, e <xref uid="langword_csharp_Server" name="Server" href=""> </xref>) utilizado para pedidos HTTP de serviço.
